actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require that medicare providers also participate in the civilian health and medical program of the uniformed services (CHAMPUS).

summary.text: Requires providers under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to participate in the Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Uniformed Services (CHAMPUS).

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require that medicare providers also participate in the civilian health and medical program of the uniformed services (CHAMPUS).
